item.title: An error with anti SYI adding
item.dc:creator: @blacksh00t blacksh00t
item.description:
@blacksh00t wrote:

ill get this error:

server.java:216: illegal start of type while<true> server.java:216: illegal start of type while<true> 2errrors...
so what the hell is wrong I thougt everything was goodâ€¦
here is the code where the error should be in-.-

public static List connections = new ArrayList(); while(true) { java.net.Socket s = clientListener.accept(); s.setTcpNoDelay(true); String connectingHost = s.getInetAddress().getHostName(); if(!connections.contains(connectingHost)) { misc.println("ClientHandler: Accepted from " + connectingHost + ":" + s.getPort()); connections.add(connectingHost); playerHandler.newPlayerClient(s, connectingHost); } else { misc.println("ClientHandler: Rejected " + connectingHost + ":" + s.getPort()); s.close(); } }
This I added under public void run.
help pslsplspl
